documentation.author: Chirayu Patel
documentation.purpose:
Below is the RULE summary (How it works):
1) Would place "ISOLATION" order, if either of below PROBLEM’s are already documented on patient’s chart, before patient is either ADMITTED to Inpatient/Observation (OR) TRANSFER to Inpatient/Observation (AND) there are NO order of "ISOLATION" in "Ordered" status on that patient’s ENCOUNTER
* ESBL (extended spectrum beta-lactamase) producing bacteria infection * Carbapenem-resistant bacterial infection * Carbapenem resistant bacteria carrier * MDRO (multiple drug resistant organisms) resistance * Infection due to resistant organism * MRSA (methicillin resistant staph aureus) culture positive * MRSA (methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus) colonization * MRSA (methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus) infection * MRSA carrier * VRE (vancomycin resistant enterococcus) culture positive * VRE (vancomycin-resistant enterococci) infection * VRE carrier
2) Would place "MRSA Nasal PCR" order, if below PROBLEM’s are already documented on patient’s chart, before patient is either ADMITTED to Inpatient/Observation (OR) TRANSFER to Inpatient/Observation (AND) there are NO orders either of "MRSA NASAL PCR" (OR) "Staph aureus/MRSA PCR (Nasal Pre-op) in either "Completed/Ordered" within last 30 days on this patient.
* MRSA (methicillin resistant staph aureus) culture positive * MRSA (methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus) colonization * MRSA (methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus) infection * MRSA carrier
3) Would place "VRE van-A PCR" order, if below PROBLEM’s are already documented on patient’s chart, before patient is either ADMITTED to Inpatient/Observation (OR) TRANSFER to Inpatient/Observation (AND) there are NO order of "VRE van-A PCR" in either "Completed/Ordered" within last 30 days on this patient.
* VRE (vancomycin resistant enterococcus) culture positive * VRE (vancomycin-resistant enterococci) infection * VRE carrier

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PT_ACTION_DETAIL_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient is ACTION and the SPECIFIC ACTION_DETAIL QUALIFIER DETAIL_VALUE

statements.statement:
select Action = if (d.seq = 1) "*ANY ACTION" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Admitted" elseif (d.seq = 3) "Encounter Combined" elseif (d.seq = 4) "Person Combined" elseif (d.seq = 5) "Person Encounter Combined" elseif (d.seq = 6) "Discharged" elseif (d.seq = 7) "Transfered" endif,
_hidden = (d.seq - 1),
Description= if (d.seq = 1) "Any patient event" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Current admit date defined, previous admit date is not defined" elseif (d.seq = 3) "Current and previous encounter id's differ" elseif (d.seq = 4) "Current and previous person id's differ" elseif (d.seq = 5) "Current and previous person & encounter id's differ" elseif (d.seq = 6) "Current discharged date is defined but previous discharge date is not" elseif (d.seq = 7) "Current and previous location codes differ" endif
from (dummyt d with seq = 7)
order by action

select Action = if (d.seq = 1) "current" elseif (d.seq = 2) "previous" elseif (d.seq = 3) "current or previous" endif,
_hidden = (d.seq),
Description= if (d.seq = 1) "Current or new admission record values" elseif (d.seq = 2) "Previous admission record values" elseif (d.seq = 3) "Check before and after values" endif
from (dummyt d with seq = 3)
order by d.seq

select Action = if (d.seq = 1) "is" elseif (d.seq = 2) "is not" endif,
_hidden = (d.seq - 1)
from (dummyt d with seq = 2)
order by d.seq

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_LOGIC_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the following templates are false, MODE logic evaluation
templateDefinitions.description: Used to control efficiency of Action Group rules

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALC_SAVE_L
templateDefinitions.description: Create a value to be used by subsequent templates

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_PROBLEMS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: OPT_PROBLEMS exist with OPT_QUALIFIER, OPT_CONFIRMATION, OPT_CLASSIFICATION, OPT_LIFE_CYCLE_STATUS, OPT_SEVERITY_CLASS, OPT_SEVERITY, OPT_COURSE for person LINK. Optionally narrow problem matching by limiting cross-mapping to OPT_CROSS_VOCABS vocabularies OPT_PERSON_ACTIVITY concepts on patient’s profile and/or OPT_VOCAB_HIERARCHY hierarchy or ignoring concepts altogether OPT_IGNORE_CONCEPTS. Find all matches OPT_MATCH_ALL.

column.value: Including cross map patient activity data
Excluding cross map patient activity data

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with order status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS on OPT_SCOPE OPT_LINK whose date criteria is OPT_QUAL OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT from the anchor OPT_ANCHOR_DT_TM.

column.value: link to other template by the same accession_id
link to other template by the same encounter_id

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SETUP_ADD_ORDERS_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Setup GROUP_NAME to add ORDERS with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT for OPT_SCOPE as OPT_LINK
templateDefinitions.description: Prepare orderables to be sent to the Order Server

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SET_ORDER_DETAIL_A
templateDefinitions.definition: SET_ACTION ORDER_DETAIL equal to OPT_VALUE or inherit it from OPT_LINK for orders setup by GROUP_NAME

column.value: Add details' value if it's not already set
Empty detail's value (for NEW order only)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALL_ORDER_SERVER_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Call order server with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT
templateDefinitions.description: Send orders and actions from prior templates to the Order Server

value.value: select Total = count(e.encntr_id) from encounter e where e.person_id = @patientid:2 detail log_misc1 = build(cnvtstring(Total)) go

values.value: MRSA (methicillin resistant staph aureus) culture positive
ESBL (extended spectrum beta-lactamase) producing bacteria infection
Infection caused by multi drug resistant bacteria

value.value: This order is placed by System.
This order is placed by System.
This order is placed by System.
